con:testCase.name: update Attachments Recipients
con:testCase.con:description: Update attachments for the follwing recipient sections: PATIENT_PERSONAL, PATIENT_CONTACT, ORGAN_REQUESTS, PATIENT_HEALTH, PATIENT_HLA

con:testStep.name: get shared donor and recipient Ids

con:request.name: updateAttachment - PATIENT_PERSONAL
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ctr="http://ctr3ws.cbs.com/"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="0" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-3" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>WS_QC</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">Anypw123!</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ctr:updateAttachment> <arg0> <attachmentID>${#TestCase#attachmentID_PATIENT_PERSONAL}</attachmentID> <nationalID>${#TestCase#recipientId}</nationalID> <description> Update count--> ${#TestCase#updateCount}: The description of the attachment has been updated.</description> <sideBysideFlag>true</sideBysideFlag> <ownerID>${#TestCase#ownerID_PATIENT_PERSONAL}</ownerID> <attachmentSection> <bizRef>PATIENT_PERSONAL</bizRef> </attachmentSection> </arg0> </ctr:updateAttachment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: updateAttachment - PATIENT_CONTACT
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ctr="http://ctr3ws.cbs.com/"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="0" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-3" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:Username>WS_QC</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">Anypw123!</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ctr:updateAttachment> <arg0> <attachmentID>${#TestCase#attachmentID_PATIENT_CONTACT}</attachmentID> <nationalID>${#TestCase#recipientId}</nationalID> <description> Update count--> ${#TestCase#updateCount}: The description of the attachment has been updated.</description> <sideBysideFlag>true</sideBysideFlag> <ownerID>${#TestCase#ownerID_PATIENT_CONTACT}</ownerID> <attachmentSection> <bizRef>PATIENT_CONTACT</bizRef> </attachmentSection> </arg0> </ctr:updateAttachment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
